replies.text: Cassie HILLARY IS WONDERFUL and I have PLENTY of faith that she will lead America to a beautiful, shining future.She is like America's Mother, The Statue Of Liberty appearing as a woman. HILLARY IS THE SHINING CHAMPION OF DEMOCRACY IN AMERICA

replies.author: Caitlin
replies.text: Think twice before you vote for crooked Hillary. Why did Bill Clinton meet with the attorney general Loretta Lynch on a private plane in Arizona when there was an active FBI investigation for his wife?Where are Hillary's 33,000 deleted emails? Huh.. or her speech transcripts to Goldman Sachs and big Banks? How about the blackberries that got destroyed with hammers ? Where are those things? Do you not think she looks like a suspect? I do. Trump2016
